#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

unsigned long long do_it(long long n){
	if(n == 1)
		return 0;
	else if(n == 2)
		return 1;
	else
		return (n-1)*(do_it(n-1)+do_it(n-2));
}

int main() {
	long long n;
	unsigned long long no_of_cards;
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	for(; n>0; n--) {
		scanf("%llu", &no_of_cards);
		printf("%llu\n", do_it(no_of_cards));
	}
	return 0;
}
